property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a feather counter on target creature. If you do, that creature has base power and toughness 3/1 and has flying for as long as it has a feather counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the skies are our only refuge, I will see all of us take wing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We coat ourselves in steel every day. What is etherium but the next logical step?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Ethersworn Shieldmage enters the battlefield, prevent all damage that would be dealt to artifact creatures this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See, children of metal? Already your bodies are rejecting harm. Continue on our path, and perfection will be yours."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Fieldmist Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Filigree Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I craved enlightenment, and Crucius's etherium opened my eyes. I would share my sight with you, but first you must believe."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glassdust Hulk gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Cycling {WU} ({WU}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Meddling Mage enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name. Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This violent wasteland is an indictment of its people. These cowards lack the will to oppose disorder."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. You gain 4 life.

property.value: "His body belongs to Bant now. His soul? I honestly don't know. I expect it belongs to the angels." - Rafiq of the Many

Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The volcanic winds make a maze of the skies of Jund. If we mean to invade, we must first learn their invisible paths."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Creations made in madness may contain great power. The path to that power is as labyrinthine as the creator's mind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It provides what every discerning mage requires - time to think.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This secret society of mages manipulates the beliefs and opinions of others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An Esper mage will leave a hole in your memory with surgical precision. A Grixis mage sees no reason to be so kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.value: It was given life by the etherium of a hundred slain Esperites.

property.value: In the Maelstrom, a trick of the light can feast on human flesh.

Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until four land cards are revealed. That player puts all cards revealed this way into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Words describing it fail. Pages relating it shrivel. Tales recounting it end.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Birth and death are both reversible." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all creatures on the battlefield and all creature cards in graveyards to their owners' hands.

property.value: The Maelstrom sent a wave of raw mana through the battlefield, carrying off the fighting and fallen alike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice five artifacts: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I pray that I am never considered useless or old." - Sharuum the Hegemon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Vedalken Ghoul becomes blocked, defending player loses 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For four nights following Ennor's death and the reclaiming of his etherium, its recipients were found slain, the etherium ripped from their bodies.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The last thought to go through their victim's mind is the one they tear out through the scalp.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the balmgivers of Bant couldn't heal the incurables, but sharing their torment helped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen death before. My mother succumbing to illness, my comrades bleeding on the battlefield . . . But I'd never seen anything as dreadful as that." - Taani, berserker of Etlan

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The behemoths are content to graze like cattle, while dragons rage and conquer. I know which example I'll follow."

property.value: "When the wielder is strong enough, any sword will do." - Kresh the Bloodbraided

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who forget their past are doomed to be eaten by it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In this new world, I have seen the once-devout rhoxes take up arms with the savages of Jund. I would be offended, but I see the wisdom in their choice." - Gernan, Dawnray archer

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Creature spells you control with power 5 or greater can't be countered.

property.value: "Some think its immunity to countermagic evolved because of the constant mage attacks on Naya. I think it just ate a bunch of wizards." - Broka, drumhunter

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elspeth's squires do not seek advancement. For them, no knightly glory could surpass the glory of serving their champion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A match for any army - even its own.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no glory in a death of age, as even the leotau know. As winter steals into their coats, they seek the deadliest lands, that they may die as they lived." - Aarsil the Blessed

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other multicolored creature you control gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I embrace all of Alara, Grixis as much as Bant. Let my former home call me traitor. I do this not for accolades, but because it is right."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Knotvine Paladin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each untapped creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is part of a new breed of guardian, one who embraces the best of both his world and ours." - Mayael the Anima

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Leonin Armorguard enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Well suited are the nacatl to a coat of steel and forge-tempered claws.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Mycoid Shepherd or another creature you control with power 5 or greater dies, you may gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As pure mana flooded across the shards, it brought a sense of unity even to Jund's vicious food chain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One sigil awarded for valor, the other awarded for surviving Hellkite's Pass."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the elves learned the hymns of angels, the knights learned the roars of titans.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not mistake a behemoth's assistance for subservience." - Mayael the Anima

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To join our ranks, one must be pure. To be pure, one must be blessed by etherium. To be blessed, one must forget oneself." - Ethersworn prayer

property.value: When Necromancer's Covenant enters the battlefield, exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard, then create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card exiled this way. Zombies you control have lifelink.

property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Tainted Sigil: You gain life equal to the total life lost by all players this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sigils corrupted by outsiders do not lose their power, only their purity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Tap target creature unless its controller pays 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I appreciate the artistry of the telemins, but the creatures of the other worlds provide a much more dramatic performance." - Ennor, mentalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Jharic returned from Grixis changed, a haunted look in her eyes. She destroyed them with an unholy glee that made me shudder." - Knight-Captain Wyhorn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a multicolored instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let us flee to the deep jungle. Our city is no longer safe - and I suspect neither is the fallback retreat."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter up to two target spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They feared each other for their differences but were absolutely terrified at their similarities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Giving a thing wings does not take away its fear of flight - or its fear of fire, for that matter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Skyclaw Thrash attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, Skyclaw Thrash gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their newfound wings shined elegantly and functioned partially.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Spellbound Dragon attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. Spellbound Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A king in Jund, a serf in Esper.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lord of Extinction's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forlorn cries of the dead combine to make its laugh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During the collision of the shards, entire ways of life disappeared without a trace.

property.value: Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.) When Marrow Chomper enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature it devoured.

property.value: "From the damned I make my garden." - Jorshu of Clan Nel Toth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 life: Putrid Leech gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It reacted to Naya's overabundant food supply by growing additional mouths.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The unit of measurement used to chart a cerodon's growth is "persons consumed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all blocking creatures and all blocked creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a battlefield falls silent, it's rarely due to a cease-fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0. As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get +0/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their hopes dashed on our shields! Their victory slashed by our swords!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidation Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature. Other creatures can't attack this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For hours afterward, all they could see was the grisly silhouette of their master, screaming.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Stun Sniper deals 1 damage to target creature. Tap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tips of her bolts are blunt, but her aim is deadly sharp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The enlightenment I never found in etherium I have found traced in the coatl's scales." - Ranalus, vedalken heretic

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nulltread Gargantuan enters the battlefield, put a creature you control on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It crushes all underfoot, yet leaves no trace of its passage - no trampled debris, no flattened souls, not even a hoofprint.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card, instead reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Godtrackers found new pantheons of beast-gods beyond Naya's borders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Vedalken Heretic deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Etherium clouded my eyes, clogged my ears, desensitized my skin. Now that I can feel, I can begin to learn."

property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The nacatl called this new species "vetli," their word for poison arrows.

property.value: The wilder the frontier, the greater the need for a controlling hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An unbound page is a riddle, free of cover and of context, a favorite token of the hegemon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target opponent. This turn, that player can't cast spells or activate abilities and plays with their hand revealed. You may play lands and cast spells from that player's hand this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are the masters of your mind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink, protection from red and from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one has properly answered her favorite riddle: "Why should I spare your life?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard your hand. Draw seven cards, then discard three cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every disaster holds mystery, for lack of a sane witness.

Rules
property.value: Skip your draw step. Whenever you sacrifice a creature, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look there - they carry that one upon a sedan chair. It must be their leader. Wait . . . Oh! Perhaps not." - Kaeda, aven scout

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cycle Jund Sojourners or it dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target. Cycling {2}{R} ({2}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste When Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund enters the battlefield, gain control of all Dragons, then untap all Dragons. Other Dragon creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lavalanche deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Alara's burning blood cannot be contained by mere earth and stone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death comes in the blink of an eye.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, Gloryscale Viashino gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is a new world and a new war. We need warriors who know chaos and how to combat it." - Lisha of the Azure

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control if you control a creature with power 5 or greater. Then you gain 10 life if you control a creature with power 10 or greater. Then you win the game if you control a creature with power 20 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cycle Naya Sojourners or it dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves had entered a land like an open grave - an act of fortitude or folly?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on Retaliator Griffin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For every eye, an eye. For every tooth, a tooth. Griffins are nothing if not fair.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Uril, the Miststalker gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It strides through the whitecover, mists in which even gargantuans can hide.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cycle Bant Sojourners or it dies, you may create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must spread Bant's light before we are shadowed over."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, if it's the first combat phase of the turn, untap that creature. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 1/1 white Bird Soldier creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are born soldiers. The call to battle is a homecoming."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jenara, Asura of War.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wounded soldiers looked up, grateful for her appearance. But she passed over them, her eyes firmly on their foe.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a permanent card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bant mages still call to the heavens for aid, but angels are not the only ones who answer.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first spell you cast each turn has cascade. (When you cast your first spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield, you may reveal any number of other artifact cards from your hand. Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each card revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Esper Stormblade gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stormcallers came to appreciate the novelty of Jund's volcanic updrafts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice a nontoken artifact: Create a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying. You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Etherium is limited. Innovation is not." - Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Grixis Grimblade gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too wary to charge, too prudent to serve. Not anymore." - Sedris, the Traitor King

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nicol Bolas doesn't distinguish between servants and victims.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Giant Ambush Beetle enters the battlefield, you may have target creature block it this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It waits with absolute stillness. One might think it a statue if it weren't occasionally seen chewing on its victims.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Jund Hackblade gets +1/+1 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The knights were halfway through their precombat rites before they realized the foul brute meant to start without them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sangrite is the dragon's beating heart. Little wonder, then, that so many fools' chests burst trying to contain it." - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Looks like we're completely outnumbered." "Lucky for us. I thought we'd be bored."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Naya Hushblade gets +1/+1 and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Bant Sureblade gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Soldiers who fought through Grixis learned to hit first, recite the prayer of Asha later.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, exile that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Messenger Falcons enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So many aven had died scouting the distant fronts that the knight-captains recruited Nayan falcons as couriers.
